page.title: 18The Harbour
page.content: The harbour in Torquay is a very busy place. There are lots of boats, large and small. Around the harbour there are benches so people can sit in the sun and lots of amusement arcades where you can waste your money. There are lots of gift and ice cream shops all over the place which only come to life in the summer. Now a fantastic new marina has been built which brings in a large amount of money as most of the boats are worth over Â£25000 and the cars in the car park aren't any old junk (a Bentley, a Porsche etc...) Unfortunately the old harbour has a terrible litter problem as all sorts of rubbish from the take-aways and the beach collects in there. The stink really is atrocious sometimes. If something isn't done about it Torquay could get a bad name.
